H0.text: From what illness did Mary II die in 1694. Smallpox-like illness (e.g., Cowpox)

H1.text: From what illness did Mary II die in 1694. Measles

H2.text: From what illness did Mary II die in 1694. Influenza

H3.text: From what illness did Mary II die in 1694. Variola

A5.text: The rash had 'turned inward', a sign that Mary was suffering from a usually fatal form of smallpox
